alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Putnam and western Allen Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spencerville In Allen County, or 7 miles north of St. Marys, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spencerville around 410 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Elida and Lima. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
